## What
Describe the change in 1 to 3 sentences.

## Why
What user problem does this solve?

## How to test
- [ ] `npm -w ui run build`
- [ ] Click through affected pages in the UI

## Security checklist
- [ ] Tools/MCP execution remains WebChat-only
- [ ] Telegram/Slack remain chat-only (no execution paths)
- [ ] No secrets are logged or echoed back
